data.message:
Will you Please STOP manufacturing Plastic Bottles. 
You produce 100 billion bottles per year😩

Coca-Cola the problem is two fold, you are trying to put the onus on people, you are the manufacturers not us, so we are ASKING that you be RESPONSIBLE and STOP using PLASTICS. 

Your only reason for not is COST! 

Secondly you are failing to realise the DEVASTATING effect PLASTICS has upon OCEAN LIFE AND LAND LIFE. 

Plastics is KILLING😩 so why won't you 'LISTEN'? ❤️
